CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic devices were fabricated using PFDTBT , PFD2TBT and the ter-polymers as p - type electron donors and by using [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as an n - type acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFDTBT
2. PFD2TBT
3. [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph. PFDTBT and PFD2TBT are identified as p-type electron donors, while PC71BM is identified as an n-type acceptor.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PFDTBT
2. PFD2TBT
3. PC71BM

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic devices were fabricated using PFDTBT , PFD2TBT and the ter-polymers as p - type electron donors and by using [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as an n - type acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PFDTBT, PFD2TBT, and ter-polymers: These are the specific types of polymers used as p-type electron donors in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
2. [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM): This is the specific type of polymer used as an n-type acceptor in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PFDTBT, PFD2TBT, ter-polymers: These are the p-type electron donor polymers used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
2. PC71BM: This is the n-type acceptor polymer used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PFDTBT, PFD2TBT, ter-polymers (p-type electron donor polymers) |
| PC71BM (n-type acceptor polymer) |
